Pre-Game Insights: Chicago Bulls coach Billy Donovan announced that Lonzo Ball would not play in back-to-back regular season games and that the team would monitor his minutes.
Others: Lonzo Ball played his first game for the Bulls in more than two years, returning from a knee injury. He played 15 minutes and scored 10 points with 1 assist and 1 block.
Arena Conditions: The game was played at United Center.
